remarks: Value of map from vectors to functionals at zero.  Note: we use ~ dvh3dim for convenience, even though 3 dimensions aren't necessary at this point.  TODO:  I think either this or ~ hdmapeq0 could be derived from the other to shorten proof.  (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmapval0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapval0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapval0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hdmapval0.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapval0.q $e |- Q = ( 0g ` C ) $.
hdmapval0.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapval0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapval0 $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` .0. ) = Q ) $.
